DatasetGroupMetadata.Title: Human fecal microbiome
DatasetGroupMetadata.Abstract: Deep sequencing of the total community DNA, cDNA, and rDNA isolated from the human fecal microbiome. Sequence data submitted to the Sequence Read Archive and the WGS projects can be found using the Project data button.

Sample.Title: ASM20576v1 assembly for human gut metagenome
ASM20578v1 assembly for human gut metagenome
